content: the misty top is a delicate airy layer with a dreamy mesh texture that drapes beautifully just right for the shifting days of early autumn with its simple and easy design it works up quickly so you can make yourself a brand-new top in just one day what this pattern has to offer - made to measure - you decide how long/short or wide/narrow your top will be - endless possibilities for customization - it can become a shrug crop top shirt tunic or even a dress while the two sleeve finishes add the perfect final touch - step-by-step instructions with detailed photos at every stage of the project - photo & video tutorials for * magic knot and changing colors with magic knot * foundation single_crochet fsc * front post double_crochet fp double_crochet and back post double_crochet bp double_crochet after purchase you will receive two pdf files - pattern and lookbook with details about tops made by me and my testers materials needed - weight 2 yarn - i m using yarnart ideal 50g = 170m - 8 0 mm and 10 0mm crochet hook - yarn needle - scissors - stitch markers this pattern is suitable for beginner / advanced beginners you should be familiar with the following crochet stitches - chain - chain - slip_stitch - slip_stitch - fsc - foundation single_crochet - treble_crochet - treble_crochet - double_crochet - double_crochet - fp double_crochet - front post double_crochet - bp double_crochet - back post double_crochet since this is a digital product there s no return or refund the reproduction or resale of this pattern in whole or in part is prohibited it is intended for personal use only you have my permission to sell items you make from my patterns as long as you please give me @szydelkoperz credit as the author of the patterns used i also ask you to sell finished items at a fair and not low price let s value our work <3
